works.title: A benchmark for toxic comment classification on Civil Comments dataset
works.abstract: Toxic comment detection on social media has proven to be essential for content moderation. This paper compares a wide set of different models on a highly skewed multi-label hate speech dataset. We consider inference time and several metrics to measure performance and bias in our comparison. We show that all BERTs have similar performance regardless...

works.title: Hate Speech and Toxic Comment Detection using Transformers
works.abstract: Hate speech and toxic comment detection on social media has proven to be an essential issue for content moderation. This paper displays a comparison between different Transformer models for Hate Speech detection such as Hate BERT, a BERT-based model, RoBERTa and BERTweet which is a RoBERTa based model.
